text: Unibuke ubwo Allah azavuga ati “Yewe Issa (Yesu), mwene Mariyamu (Mariya)! Ese ni wowe wabwiye abantu uti ‘Njye n’umubyeyi wanjye nimutugire imana ebyiri mu cyimbo cya Allah?” (Yesu) azavuga ati “Ubutagatifu ni ubwawe. Ntibikwiye kuri njye ko nabwira (abantu) ibitari ukuri. Iyo nza kuba narabivuze, rwose wari kubimenya. Uzi ibiri mu mutima wanjye, nyamara njye sinshobora kumenya amabanga yawe. Mu by’ukuri ni Wowe Mumenyi uhebuje w’ibyihishe.”
